title: AI-Powered Media Investigation
text: Intelion is an advanced AI platform designed to enhance media investigation and analytics, empowering law enforcement with real-time insights.

section.title: Automated Intelligence
section.content: Intelion leverages AI-driven analyzers to classify information, identify patterns, and locate key targets efficiently.

section.title: Real-Time Data Processing
section.content: Our platform processes vast amounts of digital content instantly, ensuring investigators get accurate and actionable insights.
